text:
Blacklane - Berlin - Lead Android Developer

- our product is providing professional ground transportation across the globe (https://blacklane.com/en/how-it-works)

- we’re looking for a good communicator with strong software development skills and a great deal of humility

- you should know your way around the shell

- we’ll help with relocation and provide a competitive salary

- here’s a sample of engineers working at Blacklane: https://github.com/AlexDenisov https://github.com/isaiah

If it sounds like a fit to you, drop me a line at claudiu-vlad.ursache+hn@blacklane.com
